intro: Paronychia argyrocoma var. albimontana, commonly known as the silverleaf paronychia, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of South America. It belongs to the family Capparaceae and is characterized by its low-growing, mat-forming habit. This variety is often cultivated for its ornamental value and adaptability to rocky or well-drained soils.
